data.comment: Text to show in confirmation card.

data.value: Pour référence, voici ce que j’ai partagé avec l’équipe de garde.
data.comment: Text to show on request submitted card.

data.comment: Text to show on the update button in adaptive card.

data.comment: Text to show on the radio button when selected urgent.

data.comment: Text to show on withdraw request action in ticket detail card in 1:1 chat.

data.comment: Text to show on withdraw button in Request submitted card.

data.name: WithdrawText
data.value: Votre demande #{0} a été supprimée. Si un autre problème se pose, faites une nouvelle demande.
data.comment: Text to show End User Notification when requets is submitted.

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Text to show yes in confirmation card.

data.name: ContentText
data.comment: Text to show in EndUser welcome card.

data.name: NewRequestBulletPoint
data.value: * Appuyez sur le bouton * * New Request * * ou tapez * * New Request * * dans cette conversation.
data.comment: Text to show command in a welcome card.

data.name: NewRequestButtonText
data.comment: Text to show in Edit task module,new request card.

data.name: WelcomeCardContent
data.value: Vous pouvez obtenir l’aide de l’équipe de garde en cas de problème.
data.comment: Text to show bot description in welcome card for EndUser.

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeSubHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as a sub header in welcome card.

data.name: AssignToMeActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to assign a ticket to himself.

data.name: ChangeStatusButtonText
data.comment: Text to show change status on button.

data.name: ChatTextButton
data.comment: Text to show chat button for EndUser.

data.name: CloseActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show Close action in Change status section.

data.name: FirstObservedText
data.comment: Text to shown title for First observed in ticket card.

data.name: ReopenActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show in change status section in SME request details card.

data.name: ReopenAssignToMeActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show in change status section in SME request details card.

data.name: RequestDetailsText
data.comment: Text to show in Request details card for Expert Team

data.name: SeverityButtonText
data.comment: Text to show severity on button in request details card.

data.name: SmeRequestDetailText
data.comment: Text to show under request submitted card to SME.

data.name: SmeUserChatMessage
data.comment: Text to show when SME user try to chat with Enduser.

data.name: UnassignActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show in change status dropdown choice in request details card.

data.name: EndUserNotificationText
data.value: L’équipe du support technique a reçu votre demande # {0}.
data.comment: Text to show EndUser notification when request is submitted.

data.name: SmeAssignedStatus
data.value: Cette demande est à présent affectée à {0}.
data.comment: Text to show notification as assigned request is closed to SME Users.

data.name: SmeClosedStatus
data.comment: Text to show notification as request is closed to SME Users.

data.name: SmeSeverityStatus
data.comment: Text to show notification when request changes severity from SME Users.

data.name: SmeUnassignedStatus
data.value: L’état est passé à affecté à {0}.
data.comment: Text to show notification when request is unassigned to SME Users.

data.name: ManageExpertsActionText
data.comment: Text to show on button

data.name: OnCallSMEDetailCardText
data.value: Voici l’équipe active de l’appel. Cliquez sur * * Manage * * pour changer les spécialistes de l’équipe.
data.comment: On call SME detail card text.

data.name: UpdateHistoryActionText
data.comment: Text to show on button

data.name: DatetimeTitleText
data.comment: Text to show on update history card title

data.name: NameTitleText
data.comment: Text to show on update history card title

data.name: NoOnCallExpertsConfiguredText
data.value: Personne n’est de garde pour l’instant. Sélectionnez **Gérer** pour ajouter des spécialistes à l’équipe de garde.
data.comment: Text to show when no on call support experts are configured

data.name: ManageExpertsTitle
data.value: Gérer la liste des experts de garde ici
data.comment: Text to show in manage experts page shown in task module

data.name: NoUpdateHistoryText
data.value: Aucun historique de garde n’est disponible.
data.comment: Text to show when no update history is available.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: Désolé... Nous avons rencontré un problème. Veuillez réessayer dans quelques minutes.
data.comment: Generic error message.

data.name: AssignedTicketUserNotification
data.value: L’équipe de support a récupéré votre demande # {0}. Un spécialiste vous contactera bientôt.
data.comment: Text to show notification for user when ticket is assigned to expert team.

data.name: ClosedTicketUserNotification
data.value: Cette demande avec le numéro de ticket # {0} est résolue. Créez une nouvelle demande si vous avez encore besoin d’aide.
data.comment: Text to show user notification message when ticket is closed by Expert Team.

data.name: EscalateButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on button in EndUser ME.

data.name: ReopenedTicketUserNotification
data.value: Nous changeons les personnes qui travaillent sur votre demande. Nous vous reviendrons prochainement.
data.comment: Text to show user when status of ticket is reopened by Expert team member.

data.name: RequestActionTicketUserNotification
data.value: L’équipe du support technique a modifié le niveau de gravité de votre demande # {0}.
data.comment: Text to show user when severity of ticket is changed by Expert team member.

data.name: DateValidationText
data.value: La date sélectionnée doit être dans le passé
data.comment: Text to show if issue date is greater than enter date of is empty.

data.name: DescriptionValidationText
data.comment: Text to show if description field is empty.

data.name: TitleValidationText
data.comment: Text to show if title field is empty.

data.name: GroupName
data.comment: Text to use as a group name when group is created.

data.name: MessageContent
data.value: Bonjour à tous, j’ai besoin d’un support immédiat pour les demandes créées par {0}. Pouvez-vous m’aider ?
data.comment: Text to show when user clicks on chat button.

data.name: InvalidTeamText
data.value: Ce robot n’a pas été ajouté pour cette équipe
data.comment: Text to show validation in ME when it is not a valid team to open request.

data.name: ExpertNameTitle
data.comment: Text to show on manage experts page

data.name: AddButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on add button.

data.name: ExpertListPlaceHolderText
data.value: Entrer un ou plusieurs noms ou e-mails
data.comment: Text to show in expert list dropdown placeholder.

data.name: ExpertList
data.comment: Text to show on list of experts from command list.

data.name: ExpertListTitle
data.comment: Text to show on manage experts page.

data.name: NoMatchesFoundText
data.value: Nous n'avons trouvé aucun résultat correspondant.
data.comment: Text to show when there are no matches to condition.

data.name: SaveButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on save button.

data.name: OnCallExpertMentionText
data.value: La liste d’experts à l’appel a été modifiée. {0} ont été ajoutés.
data.comment: Text to show when on call expert list is modified.

data.name: MaxOnCallExpertsAllowedText
data.value: Vous pouvez ajouter un maximum de 15 personnes à la liste avec un minimum de 0
data.comment: Text to show for validation message when on call experts selected are more than 15.

data.name: ExperListBulletPoint
data.value: * Appuyez le bouton **Équipe de garde actuelle** pour configurer les experts de garde de cette équipe.
data.comment: Text to show command in a welcome Team card.

data.name: SmeEditNotificationText
data.comment: Text to show when user edits the request.

data.name: SmeWithdrawNotificationText
data.comment: Text to show for SME user when withdrawn.

data.name: RequestUpdatedText
data.value: Mise à jour de la demande
data.comment: Text to show as title of ticket edited card send in 1:1 chat with bot.

data.name: WelcomeTeamCardContent
data.value: Bonjour. Je peux vous aider à aider les personnes qui interagissent avec moi et qui ont besoin d’aide.
data.comment: Text to show bot description in welcome card for Sme.

data.name: ClosedErrorMessage
data.value: Cette demande est fermée et ne peut pas être modifiée
data.comment: Text to show when user want to edit closed request.

data.name: DescriptionText
data.comment: Text to show description in request submitted card.

data.name: RequestNumberText
data.comment: Text to show as request number in new request card.

data.name: RequestTypeText
data.comment: Text to show request type in request submitted card.

data.name: TitleDisplayText
data.comment: Text to show as title text in new request card.

data.name: WithdrawErrorMessage
data.value: Seules les demandes actives peuvent être supprimées.
data.comment: Text to show when user want to withdraw closed request.

data.name: StatusCheckBulletPoint
data.value: * Pour vérifier l’état, cliquez sur la petite version de mon icône située près des options de mise en forme de message.
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card for know user how this bot hepls.

data.name: AzureStorageErrorText
data.value: Nous avons rencontré un problème lors de l’enregistrement de votre demande. Veuillez réessayer dans quelques minutes.
data.comment: Text to show error when the request is not save in the azure storage.

data.name: CancelButtonText
data.comment: Text to show for button action.

data.name: DesciptionPlaceHolderText
data.comment: Text to show in desciption place holder.

data.comment: Text to show in new request card.

data.name: SendRequestButtonText
data.comment: Text to show for button action.

data.name: TellUsAboutProblemText
data.comment: Text to show in card.

data.name: TitlePlaceHolderText
data.comment: Text to show in title place holder.

data.value: Votre session a expiré. Veuillez vous reconnecter pour continuer.
data.comment: Text to show when user session is expired.

data.comment: Text to show when user is not authenticated.

data.name: RequestStatusText
data.comment: Text to show ticket current status.

data.name: TeamRequestBulletPoint

data.comment: Text to show as a bullet point in team welcome card.

data.comment: Bot command Expert list. This needs to be matched with manifest's command "Expert list" in translated json file.

data.name: BotCommandNewRequest
data.comment: Bot command New request. This needs to be matched with manifest's command "New request" in translated json file.
